verses.verse: And at that time<WH6256> shall Michael<WH4317> stand<WH5975> up, the great<WH1419> prince<WH8269> which stands<WH5975> for the children<WH1121> of your people:<WH5971> and there shall be a time<WH6256> of trouble,<WH6869> such<WH834> as never<WH3808> was since there was a nation<WH1471> even to that same<WH1931> time:<WH6256> and at that time<WH6256> your people<WH5971> shall be delivered,<WH4422> every<WH3605> one that shall be found<WH4672> written<WH3789> in the book.<WH5612>

And many<WH7227> of them that sleep<WH3463> in the dust<WH6083> of the earth<WH127> shall awake,<WH6974> some<WH428> to everlasting<WH5769> life,<WH2416> and some<WH428> to shame<WH2781> and everlasting<WH5769> contempt.<WH1860>

And they that be wise<WH7919> shall shine<WH2094> as the brightness<WH2096> of the firmament;<WH7549> and they that turn many<WH7227> to righteousness<WH6663> as the stars<WH3556> for ever<WH5769> and ever.<WH5703>

But you, O Daniel,<WH1840> shut<WH5640> up the words,<WH1697> and seal<WH2856> the book,<WH5612> even to the time<WH6256> of the end:<WH7093> many<WH7227> shall run<WH7751> to and fro,<WH7751> and knowledge<WH1847> shall be increased.<WH7235>

Then I Daniel<WH1840> looked,<WH7200> and, behold,<WH2009> there stood<WH5975> other<WH312> two,<WH8147> the one<WH259> on this<WH2008> side of the bank<WH8193> of the river,<WH2975> and the other<WH259> on that side of the bank<WH8193> of the river.<WH2975>

And one said<WH559> to the man<WH376> clothed<WH3847> in linen,<WH906> which<WH834> was on the waters<WH4325> of the river,<WH2975> How<WH5704> long<WH5704> shall it be to the end<WH7093> of these wonders?<WH6382>

And I heard<WH8085> the man<WH376> clothed<WH3847> in linen,<WH906> which<WH834> was on the waters<WH4325> of the river,<WH2975> when he held<WH7311> up his right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> and his left<WH8040> hand<WH8040> to heaven,<WH8064> and swore<WH7650> by him that lives<WH2416> for ever<WH5769> that it shall be for a time,<WH4150> times,<WH4150> and an half;<WH2677> and when he shall have accomplished<WH3615> to scatter<WH5310> the power<WH3027> of the holy<WH6944> people,<WH5971> all<WH3605> these<WH428> things shall be finished.<WH3615>
And I heard,<WH8085> but I understood<WH995> not: then said<WH559> I, O my Lord,<WH113> what<WH4100> shall be the end<WH319> of these<WH428> things?
And he said,<WH559> Go<WH3212> your way, Daniel:<WH1840> for the words<WH1697> are closed<WH5640> up and sealed<WH2856> till<WH5704> the time<WH6256> of the end.<WH7093>

Many<WH7227> shall be purified,<WH1305> and made white,<WH3835> and tried;<WH6884> but the wicked<WH7563> shall do wickedly:<WH7561> and none<WH3808> of the wicked<WH7563> shall understand;<WH995> but the wise<WH7919> shall understand.<WH995>

And from the time<WH6256> that the daily<WH8548> sacrifice shall be taken<WH5493> away,<WH5493> and the abomination<WH8251> that makes desolate<WH8074> set<WH5414> up, there shall be a thousand<WH505> two hundred<WH3967> and ninety<WH8673> days.<WH3117>
Blessed<WH835> is he that waits,<WH2442> and comes<WH5060> to the thousand<WH505> three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> and five<WH2568> and thirty<WH7970> days.<WH3117>
But go<WH3212> you your way till the end<WH7093> be: for you shall rest,<WH5117> and stand<WH5975> in your lot<WH1486> at the end<WH7093> of the days.<WH3117>
